entry.title: first post
entry.content: I’m creating this space to talk about random things I deem interesting and also do some of those Medium-like posts explaining a paper or a concept. It has been many years now since I first wanted to explain my research in a less academic-y way, so expect that too. I’ll also try to write a copy of everything in Portuguese, because other countries exist too.
